snippet.title: Episode 1 - This Could be a Scam
snippet.description:
NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED. I just want to archive these episodes on YouTube

Lumen is enjoying a fun day playing in the park. When she realises her bear has gone missing, her family leaps into action. With lots of other Internauts around, surely someone can help them find it?

FAMILY ACTIVITY

This episode teaches us to Be Internet Alert and Be Internet Kind. Download the activity pack to learn more.

https://beinternetlegends.withgoogle.com/en_uk/parents/assets/adventure/Google_BIL_Acitivies_Ep01_A4_v2.pdf
